errors.error_description: The first example code block incorrectly imports `grad` from `autograd.core` instead of the top-level `autograd` package, which will cause an `ImportError`.
correction_candidates: Change the import to `from autograd.differential_operators import grad`.
Change the import to `from autograd.convenience_wrappers import grad`.
Change the import to `import autograd; grad = autograd.grad`.
Change the import to `from autograd import grad`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the import to `from autograd import grad`.
